meanings: Intransitive verb 지르박 스텝을 밟다, 사뿐사뿐[뽐내며] 걷다.

vlive.korean: 그 트럭에서 이렇게 올라가는 거? The scene where you hop on the truck like this? 듣기 View video ITZY : [FULL] ITZY SHOWCASE
vlive.english: The scene where you hop on the truck like this?

vlive.korean: 영화에 나오던... - 트럭 위에서도... The place from this movie... - We also shoot on top of the truck. 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#323. 자신있지 (w. ITZY)
vlive.english: The place from this movie... - We also shoot on top of the truck.

vlive.korean: 트럭. - 트럭. In a truck. 듣기 View video NCT : 💚GO! 맠,젠,나나 GO!💚with Moving studio
트럭이요. In a truck. 듣기 View video NCT : 💚GO! 맠,젠,나나 GO!💚with Moving studio
트럭 안입니다. In a truck. 듣기 View video NCT : 💚GO! 맠,젠,나나 GO!💚with Moving studio

examples.korean: Sacks were being loaded onto the truck. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 부대들이 트럭에 실리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sacks were being loaded onto the truck. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A truck came belting up behind us. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 뒤에서 트럭 한 대가 쏜살같이 달려 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A truck came belting up behind us. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The sound of the truck receded into the distance. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 트럭 소리는 차츰 멀어져 갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sound of the truck receded into the distance. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The truck skidded sideways across the road. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 트럭은 옆으로 미끄러지면서 도로를 넘어갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The truck skidded sideways across the road. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The truck driver was waiting to unload. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 트럭 운전사는 짐을 내리기 위해 기다리고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The truck driver was waiting to unload. Add to Wordbook
